content: wicked wildlings - thistlehop the wicked wildlings are a series of animal themed voodoo dolls thistlehop is a cute bunny voodoo doll materials 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn in two colors - a lighter color for the head body & limbs and a darker color for the ears embroidery floss or crochet thread for stitch lines mouth & other details safety eye or button for one eye optional safety nose small piece of felt or fabric for heart & foot pads worked in the round - top-down head & body 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 7 increase single_crochet 5 around 42 8-12 single_crochet around 5r of 42 13 increase x3 single_crochet 10 increase x3 single_crochet 26 48 14 single_crochet 2 increase x3 single_crochet 12 increase x3 single_crochet 28 54 15-19 single_crochet around 5r of 54 20 decrease single_crochet 7 around 48 *if using safety nose - center between cheeks between rounds 13 & 14 now *if using safety eye - place it between rounds 9 & 10 just to the inside of the right cheek top now *a button eye & stitched on nose can be added instead when bunny is finished 21 decrease single_crochet 6 around 42 22 decrease single_crochet 5 around 36 23 decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 24 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 25 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 stuff head making sure to shape cheek area 26 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 27 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 28-29 single_crochet around 2r of 30 30 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 31-33 single_crochet around 3r of 36 34 increase single_crochet 5 around 42 35-39 single_crochet around 5r of 42 40 decrease single_crochet 5 around 36 41 decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 42 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 stuff upper body 43 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 44 decrease single_crochet around 12 stuff rest of body 45 decrease around 6 fo close hole weave in end *stitch on x for other eye stitch on mouth just under the nose add a stitch line just above the eyes & down the back of the head add stitch lines to belly & back of body arms - make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4-7 single_crochet around 4r of 18 8 decrease single_crochet around 12 9-13 single_crochet around 5r of 12 14 single_crochet 10 chain 1 turn 10 15 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease chain 1 turn 8 16 decrease single_crochet 4 decrease chain 1 turn 6 17 decrease x3 3 fo leave tail for sewing * add stitch lines up both arms stuff lightly sew to sides of body ears - make 2 in darker color 1 single_crochet 4 into magic_ring 2-6 increase single_crochet into rest you will be adding one single_crochet to each round stopping at 9sc 7 increase single_crochet 2 around
